title: My troubles began when I found an abandoned bag of money. Can you write a composition about it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, I probably could. I’m not going to write one for you here, though, since it’s pretty clearly your homework that you have to do. Me doing your homework for you rather defeats the purpose, doesn’t it?

My troubles began when I found an abandoned bag of money. Can you write a composition about it? Sure. My troubles began when I found an abandoned bag of money. My lawyer has advised me to remain silent. The end.
No, can you? Don’t come on here asking other people to do your homework. You have to pay for that nonsense.
